General.Name: Vapiano SE
General.Description: Vapiano SE operates a chain of restaurants in the fast casual dining segment in Germany, rest of the Europe, and internationally. It operates restaurants under the corporate restaurants, joint venture restaurants, and franchise restaurants in countries under the Vapiano brand. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Cologne, Germany.
